00020 #include "EXPFileData.h"
00021 #include "FileIO.h"

00031 using namespace affxexp;
00032 using namespace std;

00036 #define EXP_HEADER_LINE_1 "Affymetrix GeneChip Experiment Information"
00037 
00039 #define EXP_HEADER_LINE_2 "Version"
00040 
00042 #define SAMPLE_SECTION_NAME "[Sample Info]"
00043 
00045 #define SCANNER_SECTION_NAME "[Scanner]"
00046 
00048 #define FLUIDICS_SECTION_NAME "[Fluidics]"
00049 
00051 #define ARRAY_TYPE_TAG "Chip Type"
00052 
00054 #define PROTOCOL_TAG "Protocol"
00055 
00057 #define STATION_TAG "Station"
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061 /* 
00062  * Trim white space from left and right
00063  */
00064 void TrimWhiteSpaces(std::string& s)
00065 {
00066         string::size_type n;
00067 
00068         n = s.find_first_not_of( ' ' );
00069         if( n != std::string::npos )
00070                 s = s.substr( n );
00071 
00072         n = s.find_last_not_of( ' ' );
00073         if( n == std::string::npos )
00074                 s.clear();
00075         else
00076                 s = s.substr( 0, n+1 );
00077 }

00095 /*
00096  * Deallocate any memory for all the class members and initialize them back to
00097  * null or zero values.
00098  */
00099 void CEXPFileData::Clear()
00100 {
00101         m_strArrayType = "";
00102         m_Scan.clear();
00103         m_Hyb.clear();
00104         m_Sample.clear();
00105 }

00107 /*
00108  * Check for the file existance
00109  */
00110 bool CEXPFileData::Exists()
00111 {
00112         // Find the file stats.
00113         struct stat st;
00114         return (stat(m_strFileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00115 }
00116 
00117 /*
00118  * Read the file contents. The first two lines are the header followed by
00119  * [Sample Info], [Fluidics] and [Scanner] sections.
00120  */
00121 bool CEXPFileData::Read()
00122 {
00123         // Clear any existing data.
00124         Clear();
00125 
00126         // Open the file.
00127         ifstream instream(m_strFileName.c_str(), ios::in);
00128         if (!instream)
00129         {
00130                 Clear();
00131                 return false;
00132         }
00133 
00134         // The first two lines are the header.
00135         const int LINELENGTH = 1024;
00136         char str[LINELENGTH];
00137     ReadNextLine(instream, str, LINELENGTH);
00138         if (strncmp(str, EXP_HEADER_LINE_1, strlen(EXP_HEADER_LINE_1)) != 0)
00139         {
00140                 Clear();
00141                 return false;
00142         }
00143         ReadNextLine(instream, str, LINELENGTH);
00144         if (strncmp(str, EXP_HEADER_LINE_2, strlen(EXP_HEADER_LINE_2)) != 0)
00145         {
00146                 Clear();
00147                 return false;
00148         }
00149 
00150         // The possible sections.
00151         typedef enum { NO_SECTION, SAMPLE_SECTION, FLUIDICS_SECTION, SCANNER_SECTION } CurrentSectionType;
00152         CurrentSectionType currentSection = NO_SECTION;
00153 
00154         // The remaining are the sample, fluidics and scanner sections
00155         bool captureAll = false;
00156         while (!instream.eof())
00157         {
00158         ReadNextLine(instream, str, LINELENGTH);
00159 
00160                 // Skip blank lines.
00161                 if (strlen(str) == 0)
00162                         continue;
00163 
00164                 // Check for the start of each section.
00165                 if (strncmp(str, SAMPLE_SECTION_NAME, strlen(SAMPLE_SECTION_NAME)) == 0)
00166                 {
00167                         currentSection = SAMPLE_SECTION;
00168                         continue;
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 else if (strncmp(str, FLUIDICS_SECTION_NAME, strlen(FLUIDICS_SECTION_NAME)) == 0)
00172                 {
00173                         currentSection = FLUIDICS_SECTION;
00174                         continue;
00175                 }
00176 
00177                 else if (strncmp(str, SCANNER_SECTION_NAME, strlen(SCANNER_SECTION_NAME)) == 0)
00178                 {
00179                         currentSection = SCANNER_SECTION;
00180                         continue;
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 // Parse the line into a name/value pair.
00184                 TagValuePairType param;
00185                 char *paramStr = strtok(str, "\t");
00186                 param.Tag = paramStr;
00187                 paramStr = strtok(NULL, "\t");
00188                 if (paramStr != NULL)
00189                         param.Value = paramStr;
00190                 else
00191                         param.Value = "";
00192                 TrimWhiteSpaces(param.Value);
00193 
00194 
00195                 // Take everything between the "Protocol" and "Station" tags. These
00196                 // may include error messages in the tag name with blank values.
00197                 if (currentSection == FLUIDICS_SECTION && param.Tag == PROTOCOL_TAG)
00198                         captureAll = true;
00199                 else if (currentSection == FLUIDICS_SECTION && param.Tag == STATION_TAG)
00200                         captureAll = false;
00201 
00202                 // If the value is blank then skip it.
00203                 if (param.Value == "" && captureAll == false)
00204                         continue;
00205 
00206                 // Double check if the "Protocol" tag is blank and skip it.
00207                 if (param.Tag == PROTOCOL_TAG && param.Value == "")
00208                         continue;
00209 
00210                 // Check for the special array type line
00211                 if (currentSection == SAMPLE_SECTION && param.Tag == ARRAY_TYPE_TAG)
00212                 {
00213                         m_strArrayType = param.Value;
00214                 }
00215 
00216                 // Store the parameter into the sample section.
00217                 else if (currentSection == SAMPLE_SECTION)
00218                 {
00219                         m_Sample.push_back(param);
00220                 }
00221 
00222                 // Store the parameter into the fluidics section.
00223                 else if (currentSection == FLUIDICS_SECTION)
00224                 {
00225                         m_Hyb.push_back(param);
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 // Store the parameter into the scanner section.
00229                 else if (currentSection == SCANNER_SECTION)
00230                 {
00231                         m_Scan.push_back(param);
00232                 }
00233         }
00234 
00235         // Close the file.
00236         instream.close();
00237 
00238         return true;
00239 }
